examples.text: Add some changes for my profile
I want to add some changes for my id
How can I change my id
Where can I update my emirates ID
How can I update my ID
I want to update my emirates ID
It was nice chatting with you
I want to check my smiles
i want to see my smiles
i want to check my transactions
i want to see my transactions
I want to check my account
Hello I am looking for some help here
What are you able to understand?
What kinds of things can you do?
Where can I find the frequently asked questions?
What else can you help me with?
Can you please give me a list of the types of things you can help me with?
Can you tell me what services you are able to help me with?
Do you have a list of things I can talk to you about?
How can you solve my problems?
I do not know what to ask
I'd like to know what type of questions you can answer for me.
Is there anything you can help me with?
Tell me about what kind of things you do?
What are my options that you can help with?
What are you able to deal with?
What can I ask you to do?
Connect me to a live operator please.
Can you connect me with a real person?
Can you assist me to connect to an agent?
Can I speak to an advisor?
Can I speak to a live person?
Can I speak to a human please?
Can I connect to an agent?
Yes, take me to a real person
Please let me talk to a human being.
Please assist me to get to an agent
Is there anyone there I can actually talk to for real?
I would like to speak to someone
I would like to speak to a human
I want to talk to a person
I want an agent to help me
I need to speak to a representative. How would I go about doing so?
I don't want to talk to you
I don't want to talk to a bot.
How can I skip the recorded menu and go straight to a live person?
Please connect me to a live agent
Could you please transfer me to your master?
Can't believe you are that good
I like what you did there! :)
I'm looking forward to working with you again! :)
You gave me exactly what I need!

Hello, hope you are doing well 😁how can I help you today? 🤔
Hi there! what can I help you with today? 😁
Hello! hope your day is going well! what can I help you with today? 😁
Why did the chatbot cross the road? Because it was programmed to be a chicken!
Why don't sharks eat clown fish? Because they taste funny
Did you hear about the claustrophobic astronaut? He just needed a little space.

Great! I'm glad that you enjoyed our conversation.Thank you 😊
I thought that I was doing well 😕 I promise you I will improve. I'll make sure that I'll work on myself for a better experience.

Thank you for your feedback. 
Feel free to reach out again at anytime 🙂
